Html:
I'm trying to get the data out of the RTE and I'm getting the following error:

A potentially dangerous Request.Form value was detected from the client (ctl00$ContentPlaceHolder1$editor="<?xml version="1.0" ...").

When I save a word document to HTML using DocIO it has the <?xml version="1.0" ...  at the beginning of the html.  and I've populated the editor with the html from that save...

Is there a work around?

Thanks for your help.
